price: 27. Tai kaip (bus baisu), kuomet angelai paims jų mirštančių sielas, mušdami jų veidus ir nugaras!
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
